DOC.brief_summary: The aim study ass effectiveness 5 mixed protocol ovarian hyperstimulation urinary gonadotrophin achieve clinical pregnancy female undergo assisted reproductive technique ( IVF/ICSI ) ( in-vitro fertilisation/intracytoplasmic sperm injection ) . Study hypothesis : mixed protocol urinary FSH ( follicle-stimulating hormone ) urinary hMG ( human menopausal gonadotropin ) effective monotherapy .
DOC.criteria: Body mass index ( BMI ) 18 30 Prolactin within laboratory normal range Couples affect sterility able treat IVF/ICSI ( invitro fertilisation/intracytoplasmic sperm injection ) Patients undergo Menopur® and/or Bravelle® treatment Normal thyroid function Women receive clomifen citrate gonadotrophin within one month prior study start Couples willing participate study sign informed consent form Failure 3 previous cycle assist reproduction IVF/ICSI ( invitro fertilisation/intracytoplasmic sperm injection ) Policystic ovarian syndrome Seminal sample apt IVFICSI ( accord criterion center ) Evidence significant bacterial infection seminogram couple precede 6 month Antecedents severe ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome ( OHSS ) Important systemic disease Pregnancy contraindication pregnancy
